name: Nezuko
description: A simple and easy-to-use WhatsApp bot project based on Multi-Device Baileys and written in JavaScript

SESSION_ID.description: A string for the session to be classified and to get access to the server endpoints

MODS.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

MONGODB.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required)

GOOGLE_API.description: Google API key for Google searches (Not Required)

WEATHER_API.description: Weather API key for weather report (Not Required)

MAL_USERNAME.description: Your username for myanimelist.net to make anime and manga search

MAL_PASSWORD.description: Your password for myanimelist.net to make anime and manga search
